AIsystem.来源: How We Investigated Mass Surveillance in Argentina

Risk.来源: Mass surveillance inherently involves collection of personal data without consent

Domain.来源: Mass surveillance systems are typically deployed in public security contexts

Stakeholder.来源: Mass surveillance affects the general population in Argentina

Impact.中文名称: 对公民自由的寒蝉效应
Impact.英文名称: Chilling Effect on Civil Liberties Impact
Impact.来源: Mass surveillance creates a chilling effect on freedom of expression and association
